nodes.text: Around four thousand years before the Battle of Yavin, the Jedi Master Thon lived in a compound on the desolate planet of Ambria. For a time, he lived there with fellow Jedi Oss Wilum, and later with Nomi Sunrider while she learned the ways of the Jedi. The compound later became known as the Ambria Jedi Enclave to history.
